# VTRAWProcessingSession.Parameter

**Enumeration**

A parameter expresses a control or a set of controls that influence frame processing.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Parameter
```

## Overview

Parameters can represent Boolean options, integer or floating-point ranges, lists, or subgroups. All parameters have a collection of [doc://com.apple.videotoolbox/documentation/VideoToolbox/VTRAWProcessingSession/Parameter/Details] containing a localized name suitable for display in UI, a longer localized description string, and a Boolean that indicates whether it’s enabled. All details, except for subgroups, must have a “key” string used to uniquely identify that parameter. All parameters other than subgroups have a collection of [doc://com.apple.videotoolbox/documentation/VideoToolbox/VTRAWProcessingSession/Parameter/Values] containing a mandatory “initial” value, and optional “neutral” and “camera” values. [doc://com.apple.videotoolbox/documentation/VideoToolbox/VTRAWProcessingSession/Parameter/IntegerParameter] and [doc://com.apple.videotoolbox/documentation/VideoToolbox/VTRAWProcessingSession/Parameter/FloatParameter] are required to have “minimum” and “maximum” values in their Values

Parameter arrays are created and returned by the VideoToolbox framework.

## Parameters

- **VTRAWProcessingSession.Parameter.BooleanParameter**
- **VTRAWProcessingSession.Parameter.Details**
- **VTRAWProcessingSession.Parameter.FloatParameter**
- **VTRAWProcessingSession.Parameter.IntegerParameter**
- **VTRAWProcessingSession.Parameter.ListParameter**
- **VTRAWProcessingSession.Parameter.Values**

## Enumeration Cases

- **VTRAWProcessingSession.Parameter.bool(_:)**
- **VTRAWProcessingSession.Parameter.float(_:)**
- **VTRAWProcessingSession.Parameter.int(_:)**
- **VTRAWProcessingSession.Parameter.list(_:)**
- **VTRAWProcessingSession.Parameter.subgroup(details:elements:)**

## Configuring parameters

- **parameters()**: Returns an asynchronous sequence that provides updates to the processing Parameter array if the processing extension makes changes to the set of Parameters.
- **updateParameter(values:)**: Sets the value for one or more of the processing parameters.
- **processingParameters**: An array of processing parameters available for this RAW processing session.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
